title: Avenged Sevenfold's Season Pass is Turning Heavy Metal Fans Into Blockchain 'Evangelists'
description: Frontman Matt Sanders (aka M. Shadows) explains how the Fortnite-style platform offers fans rewards for engaging with Avenged Sevenfold.

title: What’s YouTube’s Stand on OpenAI’s Sora and ChatGPT Training?
description: In a recent development, OpenAI has received a strong warning from YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about using its platform to train the cutting-edge AI models Sora and ChatGPT. This warning is given in light of possible violations of YouTube’s terms of service as well as worries about the source of training data. A discussion regarding […]

title: Brooklyn DA cracks down on ‘pig butchering’ crypto scam, saves millions for victims
description: The Brooklyn DA Office, led by Eric Gonzalez, has dismantled a sophisticated cryptocurrency scam that duped individuals across the U.S. out of millions.
